wordGroup: gastrointestinal tract 胃肠道；胃肠管
upper gastrointestinal hemorrhage 上消化道出血；上消化道血
gastrointestinal system 肠胃系统；消化系统

sentences.en: Epidemiological studies have found that children with PDD have no higher prevalence of gastrointestinal tract than normal children.
sentences.cn: 流行病学研究发现，广泛性发育障碍（Pervasive Developmental Disorder）孩子和正常孩子相比较并没有更高的胃肠道患病率。

sentences.en: This will allow the robot to crawl around the gastrointestinal tract, perform treatment with appropriate surgical tools, and perform biopsies.
sentences.cn: 这将使机器人可以在胃肠道周围爬行，用适当的外科手术工具施行治疗，且可以进行活体组织检查。

sentences.en: The solubility, stability in gastrointestinal tract, membrane permeability and presystemic metabolism of drugs were the major factors on oral drug absorption.
sentences.cn: 药物的溶解性，在胃肠道中的稳定性，膜的通透性和全身代谢是影响口服药物吸收的主要因素。
